info.name: Gmx - webmails - restore blue buttons bar
info.description: In july 2020 Gmx changed the color scheme of the buttons bar from blue to gray. This modification was applied to all gmx webmails domains ( .net, .com, .fr, .es, ... ) This stylesheet restores the original layout. It is the exact style, and was recovered from a backup I've made earlier this year. This stylesheets works on: gmx.net, gmx.com, gmx.fr, gmx.es, gmx.co.uk, gmx.at, gmx.ch gmx.net gives you the choice of the layout color scheme. This fix works only on the default layout. For more userscripts, styles, extensions, tips, ..., visit my programming page.
